- false

- '2024.1'

A simple cython based interface to the pardiso solver

name: pydiso

about.summary: A simple cython based interface to the pardiso solver

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "0.2.0"
  # ensure is_freethreading gets detected as a used variable
  touch_is_freethreading: ${{ is_freethreading }}

package:
  name: pydiso
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/p/pydiso/pydiso-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 336494e121afa169f2da25c5faa00785251ac8c7ebe3c98e120cc89b30ab447d

build:
  number: 1
  skip: match(python, "<3.11")

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - pip
    - meson-python
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
    - python
    - python-build
    - cython
    - numpy
    - setuptools_scm >=6.2
    - mkl-devel
  run:
    - python
    - numpy >=1.22.4
    - scipy >=1.12
  run_constraints:
    # Block openmp from being installed in the same environment (conflicts with numpy and MKL)
    # done by giving an unsatisfiable openmp version.
    # Note: llvm-openmp is safe though.
    - openmp ==99999999999999

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - pydiso
        - pydiso.mkl_solver

about:
  homepage: https://www.simpeg.xyz
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A simple cython based interface to the pardiso solver'
  repository: https://github.com/simpeg/pydiso

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jcapriot
    - lheagy

about.summary: A simple cython based interface to the pardiso solver
